snippet.title: I'm a love interest in my childhood friend's reverse harem!!! trailer
snippet.description:
A parody otome game with BL possibilities.

Instead of playing the heroine, you play as Geum Park, the childhood friend. Will you play the role of a love interest and romance the girl, or turn this into a BL story by making the other boys fall for you instead?

Itch.io page - https://red-baby.itch.io/my-childhood-friend
Steam page - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1365620/Im_a_love_interest_in_my_childhood_friends_reverse_harem/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/WitPop
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/witpop.games/

Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/redchan17
